full_summary:
### Psychology Services for Ottawa Area Parole Offices

** Solicitation Number: 21470-27-4320506 **

** Tender Closing Date: October 2nd, 2023 at 14:00:00 **

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), in the Ontario Region, is seeking bids for Aftercare Psychology Services for the Ottawa Area Parole Offices. This requirement is divided into two Streams, A and B. Bidders may submit a bid for one or both streams.

**Objective:**

The objective of this requirement is to provide essential and non-essential mental health and/or psychological assessment or psychological risk assessment services to offenders, as requested by the Project Authority, as a psychologist at the Contractor's business location in the Ottawa area in the Ontario Region or other CSC-approved locations when needed.

** Deliverables:**

The Contractor must provide all services in compliance with federal and provincial legislation and standards, provincial and national guidelines, practice standards, and CSC Policy/ Guidelines, including the CSC Mental Health Policy and Integrated Mental Health Guidelines. 

The Contractor must provide services in accordance with the ethical and professional practice standards of the applicable provincial regulatory body, the Canadian Code of Ethics for Psychologists, and relevant legislation guiding the practice of Psychology within correctional settings.

**Duration of Contract:**

The period of the Contract is from November 1st, 2023 to October 31st, 2026, with the option to renew for two (2) additional one-year periods.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

Bids will be evaluated on the basis of the lowest price.

**Security Requirements:**

This contract includes security requirements.

**Submission Information:**

Bidders can obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from the Canada buys / tender opportunities website.
